description: Searches user profiles in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which you want to search user profiles.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Specifies the user type for the SearchUserProfiles action.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the SearchUserProfiles action.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of an IAM user profile in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: firstName
nested_items.description: The first name included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: lastName
nested_items.description: The last name included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: username
nested_items.description: The username included in the single sign-on details of the user profile.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain of the user profile.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user profile.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the user profile.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the user profile.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of results is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of results, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to SearchUserProfiles to list the next set of results.
